answerText: The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman[10] In one scene, Tristram gives a needlessly detailed description of the posture of this character as he delivers a blasphemous sermon on conscience. This real name of this manservant to Uncle Toby is James Butler.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Penn A + Chicago B | 13 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: When one character in this novel curses after cutting his thumb, another character supplies him with an excommunication document with which to supplement his curses. For 10 points each: [10] Name this comic novel by Laurence Sterne, whose title character suffers an accidental circumcision while urinating out a window when the sash falls on his penis.
